name: Crap Collector
description:
Original GGJ2018 site link

Take on the daring role of a professional Crap Connector! Your goal is to transmit the signal from an origin device to an end-point device. The problem is that you don't seem to have the correct, direct fitment connector! This game will help you solve the mystery of connecting your Speakers by way of your Cat.

Created in less than 48 hours by a group of Playcrafting initiates using Unity Engine and free assets.

Bob Pira @ http://bpgaming.org
Eddie Sanchez 
Christian Strohm @ http://lateinlifegames.com
